title: Can not connect after champion select
body:
After everyone selects a champion it disconnects and doesnt even bring up a loading screen. It says to reconnect but it does not work. I have tried run with admin, to repair it and i have tried the delete/rename the logictech files in RADS but nothing has worked. It worked for a day about 2 days ago but then went back to disconnecting me. It has been more then fustrating. Its been days and its still not working. 

Has anyone had the same trouble? 

If anyone has any idea how to fix this problem please le me know.

replies.body: I'm having this problem too it was working fine until I tried to make a custom game then after champ select I just dc from the server without getting the loading screen. I looked at tech support and all it said is that I'd have to wait for it to work eventually.

I also got this today after it working fine yesterday with no patch, i tried to play a game and after champ select got disconnected without a loading screen and could not play, have tried 4 times since and still the same thing. it's also happening to a friend of mine, but not my other friend....so not sure what's going on.

I think its an ISP issue if you get the "unable to connect to the server" message. I am having the same issue and just happened today for some reason. I suggest contacting your ISP and maybe check out their technical supports page if there is one. There are usually people who post comments that might have similar issues as well. If it is confirmed that it's the ISP fault, then you can't really do much about that except wait until it's resolved or use a different ISP.
